title: Hotel Booking Management System
description: Built a fully functional hotel reservation system with an interactive GUI for customers and staff to manage bookings, check-ins, and availability. Integrated a relational database using Apache Derby to store bookings and customer information, with SQL queries to support core operations.

title: Medication Lookup Tool
description: Built a tool enabling users to search for medications by name and view matching pill images with the goal of assisting pharmacists in identifying oral medications and improving patient safety. Served RxImage data from a locally hosted Express API as the public API was deprecated.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: Developed a personal portfolio website using Astro to show my projects. Improved my frontend skills and understanding of performance-optimized static site generation.
